text: Jorge Alberto Jacobson (25 February 1936 â€“ 31 July 2014) was an Argentine radio and television journalist and newscaster. He was anchor of Telefe Noticias from 1997 to 2010 and as host in AM Del Plata, Radio 10 and Radio Continental. He was of Jewish descent. Jacobson died from a heart attack in Buenos Aires, aged 78. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Argentine Jews Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Jewish writers Category:Writers from Buenos Aires Category:Argentine journalists
title: Jorge Jacobson
